attributes.additional_details: If you have ever known a relative or friend who has been through the undignified torture of terminal illness - be it cancer or any other illness, you will probably have felt the pain and despair of having to see them go through it. It may be too late for them, but it's about time we finally took a stand. We put our pets down when they're facing the rest of their life in pain because it's the kindest thing to do, so why can't this be extended to humans? This may affect you in the future, or it may affect your loved ones. Let's make a change.
